name: @d8a/ga4-duplicator
description: GA4 network request duplicator (browser inline script) - TypeScript source + minified dist build.

scripts.build:prod: mkdir -p dist && find src -type f -name "*.ts" -print0 | sort -z | xargs -0 cat | sha256sum > src.hash && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && sed '/^export /d' ./dist/ga4-duplicator.js > ./dist/ga4-duplicator.tmp.js && mv ./dist/ga4-duplicator.tmp.js ./dist/ga4-duplicator.js && terser ./dist/ga4-duplicator.js --compress --mangle --output ./dist/ga4-duplicator.min.js && cp ./dist/ga4-duplicator.min.js ../../pkg/protocol/ga4/static/duplicator.js
scripts.hash: [ "$(find src -type f -name '*.ts' -print0 | sort -z | xargs -0 cat | sha256sum | cut -d' ' -f1)" = "$(cut -d' ' -f1 src.hash)" ]
